name: Beth Wright
text: They were so wonderful to work with! Very friendly and so helpful! Very knowledgeable and willing to make everything perfect! We are repeat customers and  will definitely use them again if formal wear is needed!

name: Oreo woods
text: I am so pleased with the tuxedo my son rented for his prom!  It was the perfect fit and he looked amazing!  I haven't found another store in town that could come close to the price of the tuxedo either.  We will be back!!!!

name: Jill
text: Beware of a change in rental return. They don’t go by what’s written on the original ticket. After my son’s prom, he did say it was due back between 12-2 Sunday. Their store isn’t even open Sundays! So I checked the original paperwork and it read due Monday. So the. I get charged $20 on top of the $160 already paid!  Btw no shoes included!!  What a rip off! I spoke to the manager and her claim was a yellow card was included, I told each and every one. What happened to customer service?!? Check around before you rent her and be wary of a change in co tract. Their no good for their ‘word’ even when it’s in writing!

resp.text: Hi Jill, We are sorry for the miscommunication. Your son was correct that we required tuxedos to be returned last week on Sunday between 12-3pm. This is not our normal hours of operation but due to high demand we are sometimes forced to add an extra day to our work week. If you have any other questions please reach out to us at 256-766-6214

name: Sherrie Behel
text: We had to change our venue for my daughters wedding reception due to CDC Covid-19 regulations.  Ended up in a gym but Party Pros came through and made it a fairytale venue!  Everyone involved was super nice and so helpful!!! If we ever need a rental service again, I’ll definitely choose them!  Highly recommended.

name: hazey daze
text: The super short owner Jackie hendrix  is disgusting the way he treats his employees will never recommend to friends and family

name: Sherry Campbell
text: Jackie Hendrix is not only the ultimate professional, he is just a really nice guy.  We called him at 4:00 pm the day for our Dickens Festival.  It was about to be rained completely out. Jackie very calmly laid out festival in an indoor facility and texted me the schematic so I could look at it while we talked.  He brought his team of professionals in and in less than 12 hours had us a tent set up with sides, heaters and lights.  He also decks my brothers homes out in Christmas lights every year and they are beautiful.  I have worked with him on 2 weddings and there is no one any better.

name: Georgia Bivens
text: The dinnerware was fine and as pictured. Their tablecloths have yellow stains on them. We rented a tent in case of rain for an outdoor wedding. I would not recommend the tent.  It was worn, ripped and dingy. I ordered the tent based on what they had pictured but it was nothing like was pictured on their website. They do not respond to your complaint either. Not once has the manager reached out to me.

text: Staff friendly & knowledgeable, some more helpful than others. Quick service. Did not call when order was ready & did not return messages. Fair prices.

text: First and foremost I cannot say enough great things about these guys! From start to finish they have been nothing short of amazing. He kept me updated throughout the entire process and when I last minute called him to reschedule for a different day (due to inclement weather) than originally planned he was very accommodating and had no issue with it. Day of delivery the guys got out there and set up everything so quickly it was awesome! These guys are the best around the area hands down! Great and FAIR prices for a great quality water slide we rented!! Last but not least the huge game changer for me was THEY DELIVER ON FORT BENNING!!! Thank you so much again! We look forward to continuing business with  Inflatables!!!

text: I used this company yesterday for my daughter's birthday party and the kids loved it! Their set up was efficient and professional. The deliverers were friendly and professional and talked us through the whole set up. We didn't have any issues with the inflatable water slide. It was clean and in great condition when delivered. I would definitely recommend this company to others.

name: Mimis Webkinzs
text: Rented the tropical slide for the 4th of July. Wonderful experience and very professional! Will be using this company again in the future !

name: Ashley Cole
text: Great Honest and professional folks. Not to mention they'll go above and beyond for their customers.

name: Sarah Roth
text: Cannot say enough good things about this company and the people working there! We had a last minute cancellation on an inflatable from another company (due to their policy regarding weather - no fault of theirs, we knew the risk) but Summer Fun saved my daughters birthday party and got us a rental that all the kiddos LOVED ! We called on Friday and they had it set up for us early on Saturday. The entire experience was great, the people who set and broke down were so sweet and considerate. Really cant rave enough about them - THANK YOU SUMMER FUN! :)

name: Amanda Pickett
text: Their AWESOME! Very nice people. The bounces are nice an clean.

name: Jen Carpenter
text: Mike and Misty are incredible!! I worked with them and their team for over 10 years. I hired them several times for multiple events over our history together.  We did events for 20 and events for 2000. They are able to locate any special request items (even finding me a professional karaoke machine so I wouldn’t have to rent one from them as often. They are the absolute best. Highly recommend. 10/10.

name: Chelsia Strain
text: I used them for my daughters first birthday party. Got a big misting fan. I was suppose to pick it up the night before. They over booked it so they offered to bring it to me the next day. I didn't make it to my house until noon which was okay the party wasn't until later then they cane back and picmed it up four hours later. I paid for an all day rental. They are nice people just a little disappointed in how the events turned out. I will probably use them again so they can redeem the loss.

name: Rick Blaine
text: I have used them for my kids birthday parties, everything from big slides to concessions.  Staff was always very professional and had everything up and running before our actual start time.  Will definitely keep using them.  Wonderful job !!!

name: Amy Tadlock
text: Great for a child birthday party. Limited choice on the different jumps but great for children.

name: Jay Friday
text: Jumps A Lot is awesome!  I had my daughters 6th birthday party there. We have been to all the bounce houses in the area and Jumps A Lot is by far the best. The inflatables are better than any other around and all the kids loved it!  Some of the other parents commented on how clean the inflatables were. The staff did a great job and most important all the kids had a blast.  I would highly recommend this place to anyone.

name: Brianna Payne
text: I ordered an inflatable for my son's 5th birthday party! There was a slight mix up, but the manager resolved it in what has to be record time! The gentleman who delivered the jump was so nice and accomaditing to make sure I pleased and everything was good to go! Not only that, but the inflatable was CLEAN! Having ordered 2 before from a different company, I expected the normal sweeping and need for a wipe down, but this one needed nothing! I FULLY recommend Jumps-A-Lot, their equipment, and their staff to anyone searching to rent an inflatable for a party! For anyone wondering, we used the 5-in-1 Combo and it is AWESOME!

name: Kathryn Lee
text: Fun for the kids most games did not work and the 2 helpers did not seem to happy to help and didn't get mich help from them

text: Fun but a lot of the games were out of order

text: My daughter loves the place!

text: Beautiful facility!!! Owners and staff are top notch!

name: Kw Styron
text: Lovely atmosphere great for large groups.

name: Jonah Norris
text: Just an all around amazing place

name: Shonice Pitts
text: We recently rented a bounce house from Jump To It for a birthday party. The bounce house was very clean and people of all ages were able to enjoy it during the party. I truly enjoyed the service provided by the company! Everyone I interacted with over the phone or in person were very helpful and friendly. They were able to clearly answer any questions I had about the booking and payment process. I will be booking from them again!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review Shonice! We had such a great experience we would like to extend free delivery on your next reservation! Thank you again 😀

name: Brian Wright
text:
I wasn't going to leave a review since I never actually received the slide however when the person showed up to set it up that was the tipping point.

So we rented a water slide, the tropical 18 foot water slide, and were very excited for our kids birthday party. We paid in full as we always do with rentals and we're ready for a great party. We requested set-up for 10:00 since party was from 12 - 3, keep that in mind for later. A week and a half before the party we went to the website and noticed the slide we rented had been removed which raised concern. Ended up calling Jump To It Inc and asking why it was removed and brought up some negative reviews which we read on Google. First they told me there were some issues and they would call me back, never did. I called them again Monday the following week and they stated they had issues with the slide we rented and it was being repaired. The person whom I spoke with stated it "should be" good for our party but if I see another I like they will swap it out. So I go on their site and searched and had to pretend like I was going to reserve just to see what was available. This whole experience left me uneasy so I went with another company and cancelled the rental and they gave me a refund minus 30 dollars which is a surcharge and that's fine.

Fast forward to the day of the party and the delivery guy shows up to setup the slide. I explain to him we cancelled the order and he was nice and ended up leaving. Keep in mind above the party was 12 - 3, he shows up at 3. This made me very glad we cancelled as the party went well but had we kept it the delivery wouldn't even have occurred until after the party.

resp.text: Thank you for you’re review. The slide you reserved and cancelled was ordered again at the last minute for 4pm that day. The delivery guy was mistakenly sent the incorrect invoice showing your reservation. Luckily it was corrected in time to be delivered to the correct person for them to have a wonderful event! Our apologies for the mistake and confusion. Thank you for your review 🙂

name: Amanda Joiner
text: I rented a bouncy house for my son's birthday party and when the delivery men came to set it up it was the wrong one that we paid for. They had to reload it back into the truck and bring the right one. The party started at 2 and they didn't get back until 3 when they originally came at 10:30 in the morning the first time. After they got it setup they were suppose to come back at 5:30 to pick it up but didn't come get the bouncy house until almost 9 at night. We called numerous of times and they did not communicate well on what was going on and kept saying they were on there way but it was getting later and later. They kept asking for directions when we explained it to them several times. The bouncy house was dirty and had leaves all in it. I understand things happen and people make mistakes but the amount that I paid for that bouncy house wasn't worth all the trouble it was and the quality wasn't great either for the price they charge for just 3 hours. We won't be renting from them again or reffering anyone else we know either.

resp.text: Hello Amanda, we would like to make this right! Please give us a call or email so we can mend the actions of the back up drivers we used that weekend. Hope to hear from you soon!

name: tanisha arseneau
text: It’s not everyday you run into a company that’s all about their customers and the community!! I’m the Program director for Girls on the Run North Alabama in Madison County and we had not been able to find any company willing to donate a bounce house. Well I reached out to the owner of Jump to it and without hesitation he said to find the one you like and book it!! GOTR is a non profit organization and our mission is to inspire girls to be joyful, healthy and confident using a fun, experience-based curriculum which creatively integrates running. This was our Fall 5K and It wouldn’t have been such a fun filled event without the bounce house. The delivery was on time and the guys were extremely respectful and kind. We thank you so much Jump to it for working with us and giving back to the community with your generous donation!!! We look forward to seeing your continuous growth and success!!! ❤️

resp.text: Thank you!!

name: Amanda Dickey
text: My sister rented a water slider last weekend for my sons birthday party, I was so humiliated the palm trees wouldn't stay up they kept laying over the slide and steps. The slide was full of holes and tears with duct tape over some. We had to wear t-shirts because the slide was so rough people were getting hurt by the slide. It was supposed to be dropped off at 11 it wasn't there until 2, then we couldn't find the water hook up and when my sister called we found out there was no hook up and we had to fix the hose pipe up on the slide to wet it, we did they didn't. This company is not helpful and we will never use them again. We should get a full refund for this!

name: Rachel Dickey
text: Went to a party last weekend and my daughter rented a waterslide from jump to it. It was awful...It was old, torn and patched with duct tape, the palm trees wouldn't stay up. Alot of people were hurt by the rough slide. There was no place to connect the water hose and they informed us you get wet then slide down makes it a waterslide. They dropped it off late and picked it up late. Very disappointed!!!!

name: Christina Wolde
text: I rented a bounce house and a dry slide today.  The bounce house was great.  However, the dry slide was very difficult to slide down.  There was something on the surface that seemed to have the effect of sliding down a rubber material.  I had to on purpose use my hands to work my way down to the slide to the end.  I have rented slides from other companies in the past and never had this problem.  The kids had the same problem too and ultimately found the slide very boring and disinteresting.  It was almost as if it had a residue on it that caused resistance the whole way down.  We called and told the company but they just acted like that sounded very strange.  We asked them to try the slide themselves when they came to pick it up but we never heard anything after that.

name: carey FRASIER
text: was not what I expected but received a professional response to resolve the matter.

resp.text: Thank you for your review.

name: Crystal Huddleston
text: My sister and I rented a waterslide for kiddos birthday and it was absolutely a blast! Prices are affordable, setup and take down was fast. We will definitely be renting from here again!

resp.text: Thank u!!!

name: Jamillah Salaam
text: We ordered a Water Slide for Memorial Day weekend and it was so much fun. It was a hot Day and everyone enjoyed cooling off at our backyard BBQ. Thank you Jump to it for being prompt and affordable. My family from ages 5 - 48 was on the water slide having the time of their life 💯❤️

name: G White

name: Laura Foster
text:
In June I had plans to rent a water slide bounce house combination unit, I reserved it and paid for it weeks in advance. I was called about a week before by someone in the office, they said it was being repaired so I needed to pick a different unit AND pay the difference. I didn't want just a slide or just a bounce house, and I didn't want to spend $150 more dollars for a different combination unit, I thought that was unfair and wanted to cancel my reservation. As soon as I told them I wanted to cancel The customer service went from great to fair (and by the end of my experience, poor).They called again and said they would give me a different combination unit that cost more and they would discount the amount so it was priced equal to what I had reserved. We ended up changing the date of the event partly because of this issue and our event was rescheduled to the last weekend in July. On the invoice I received the day before the event it showed a combination unit, that was priced more than the original and that they discounted the price so I didn't owe more. I was happy, it was what I wanted; a bounce house and slide together. When they show up on Saturday they bring a completely different unit. It was ONLY a slide. This is not what I wanted. The event was for a 2 year old and he (and many of the other kids) couldn't even enjoy this particular slide because it was for much older children.
I'm really disappointed in this experience and had I known I was getting a slide only I would have cancelled. I sent Jump To It an email more than two weeks ago to let them know I wasn't happy and haven't heard one word back from them.

name: Malp Sugimoto
text: I rented the 68 ft obstacle course today. Everything arrived on time and looked great. I've always had wonderful experiences with Jump To It and I will continue to use them for all of my kids parties.

name: Jonathan Johnson
text: Very satisfied with the equipment we rented. Once it was set up we had a great time and everyone loved it! We used the basketball toss inflatable. However, the reason for no 5 star review is due to the lack of timeliness from the company. Our event started at 3:00pm, we were told the inflatable would be there by 2:00pm, 1 hour prior to the event kicking off. They arrived around 3:20pm. If they could fix their scheduling and logistics, then this would have been a 5 star experience.

name: jamie hardiman
text: I am the PTO President of a local elementary school and we have rented from the company 3 times. The 2nd time was for a school carnival.  We asked them to be there 2 hours before the carnival and they were late, they finished setting up right as the carnival started and left.   Right after they left a volunteer called me to the area and told me the inflatable wasn't staying inflated.  Turns out they didn't attach enough blowers (they had some of the sections knotted off). I called them and they couldn't come right back so the inflatable was down for about an hour of our 3 hour FUNDRAISER carnival.  As an "I am sorry" they offered a 50% discount on the next rental.   We decided to take them up on their offer and rented 2 inflatables for our Halloween Trunk or Treat.  Again, I asked them to be there at a certain time to leave plenty of time for set up and they were late again.  They pulled up 5 minutes before the event time and we had to block off our trunk or treat area and delay the start because their trucks were in the area of where the kids had to go.  They set up and left.  About 10 minutes into the carnival I got a call from a volunteer that there were 2 kids hurt on the inflatable because it wasn't staying inflated in the middle.  I inspected and it was not properly working.  I called Corey and he said he couldn't come back so we had to shut the inflatable down.  I communicated with him after the event about how unhappy we were and he informed me he would be sending a refund (I have this in a text message from him).  When I never got the refund he then said he would rather give us a discount on a future rental. I told him that we will never be renting from him again and we wanted the refund he told us he would be giving.  This business has ruined part of TWO fundraisers for a local elementary school and shows no remorse for the kids that got hurt.  We had two young children with bloody noses because of the improper equipment (there were not enough blowers on the inflatables, both times there were sections knotted off without blowers attached).  This is poor business practice and I would NEVER recommend ANYONE to use this company.

name: Justin Cannady
text:
I would like to commend Top Notch Events and Rentals for the promptness for both days of our event. Everything was delivered and picked up in accordance with the contract.

Regrettably, I was very disappointed in the lack of professional guidance and foresight that the company provided concerning the setup for my event on 1/20/19 at Vulcan Park and Museum. First and foremost, the tent was not placed the way we discussed previously. After the initial discussion and sending a detailed floorplan to Top Notch, I arrived to find the tent's short side positioned parallel to the Vulcan statue. Due to this error and Top Notch’s worker's unwillingness to help change it, a domino effect of massive changes that would ultimately have me working to change the entire floor plan two hours prior to the beginning of my own event – including moving tables, chairs, and other equipment around. The worker did not help with the changes in the floorplan. I even asked the worker if he could get some more sidewall for the other tent. He told me he would and never did.

To compound the poor set up experience, the tent would not stay warm after being guaranteed that the heaters "would keep the tent very warm and we did not need any more heaters." I think that may have been the case if 1) both heaters worked the entire time and 2) the bottom of the tent would have been secured so the wind would not make them flap. A company that claims to have set up hundreds of events did not even ensure basic set up was accomplished. Due to the temperature inside the tent, the band refused to play. We had to wait nearly an hour before a repairperson arrived to fix the heater. Around 7:00 PM, the band resumed playing.

I have not ever had an experience so horrible and on the day of my wedding reception makes this exponentially worse. As I know mistakes happen, I feel much of these could have been avoided had I been given the correct guidance and Top Notch did their job of securing the tent properly (as well as supplying working heaters). Being unfamiliar with event planning in general and the previous events held at Vulcan, I feel that Top Notch should have provided any additional information to clients to make sure the event would run as smoothly as possible. In addition, I would like to point out I have exhausted every action I could prior to posting this review. I always try to work out differences in a private setting as opposed to in a public forum. Unfortunately, Top Notch was not interested in working things out and felt they were completely absolved from any blame. This company is amateur and unprofessional – pay a little extra and use a company that knows how to properly set up for any event!

text: A good place to rent from - just be very specific with you need/want. We had a ribbon cutting event and we got everything we needed from them - but here's the problem. While most of the items were downstairs by the stage, some items were used upstairs by reception. The latter items were not found and whoever picked up most of the items left without them. Apparently they tried to pick them up two more times - but the receptionist said she never had them stop by. My guess is that he tried going through receiving and didn't ask anyone where the items were. When we spoke with the manager, he promised they'd be picked up Friday afternoon - well the delivery guy had a delay and couldn't make it that day despite the fact the items had been there for more than a week. If anything, the company is good but pickup/delivery is sketchy. Just be very clear with what you want and WHEN. and you should be fine.

They said that they would be my backup if I did not find anyone. They also said they were willing to even lower the rental cost if I picked up. If I did that, I was also avoiding the delivery cost. I reserved with them as a back up. Such compassion. Oh, I almost forgot to mention, I ended up going with someone else and they gave me my retainer back. No money lost.

What she did was involve my company to take the attention away l from hers. You never gave a deposit to my company which is a policy, you never had an appointment or contact with myself or partner. I told you I would not service you because I wanted no connection to any transaction gone wrong by you and some other company not in association with mines. After you choose to go with a venue in Florida, which we are not licensed to work in, I did refund you 100% of your floral invoice. text: Easy to get in touch with, a great company especially for a last minute service.  Did i meantion good prices too.

name: Capree Williams
text:
For years Blue Rents was always the place to rent from. Not anymore. They will not give you a quote on anything unless they get approval from the general manager. I stopped in to rent a tent, Chairs and Tables. Took my request but they were not able to rent until the general manager approved the labor fee for delivery.
Don't expect to hear back from them until the day before your event. I don't understand that. So, I decided to go with a different company.

name: Adrian Darrington
text: Tried to rent a coolant fan Monday and was told it had to be approved by the manager. With me calling numerous times and coming to the business. I found out Thursday that I couldn’t rent it with no explanation of why.

name: Lacey Sumerlin
text: I give it two stars only because the ladies at the desk when I went IN the store were very nice and helpful. I have gone in twice and called two times outside of that to get my quote. They assured me I would get something in my email and haven’t yet.  I am planning a wedding and needed all my ducks in a row. It’s been 4 months and I still have not received my quote after they assured me I would. They have some really nice things available to rent, but after numerous times on reaching out to get the ball rolling, I have taken my business somewhere else.

name: Samantha Autery
text: This was ridiculous the one woman I spoke when I rented them it was great. But on pick up day it took 90 minutes! Between the girl not knowing how to actually finish the transaction at the front to the snail slow folks in the back who you would think knows where everything is since it is their job! But nope. Plus my husband and son did almost all the work. This place is a joke. Will never do business there again.

name: Enocolis Lampkin
text: Real bad customer service went in to rent some items a young lady went to back and got a gentleman he came back out and said they couldn’t rent to me cause I was about to fight an employee. I said you have the wrong person he kept saying they said it was you or someone who may have return your stuff I said couldn’t be cause I was only one who returned my stuff and I sure didn’t get into it with no one. I actually believe they didn’t think I had money and I was black but took my business somewhere else and when the company I work for tried to rent for them I told them what happened to me there and they took they business to this other company I rented from I will never come back into this place or let anyone I know rent from they I was in total shock with them about the false accusations. But it’s all good though found company that appreciate their customers and not make up lies on them.

name: S Johnson
text: I rented a drum sander for one week yesterday from the Mobile,  Alabama location and purchased $100.00 in sanding sheets. (this brought the $ total to $350.00 )  once I was home and my subcontractor arrived to begin work... It was discovered that I was given a sander and sanding sheets for different models. It was after closing so I had no option but to send my worker home and deal with blue rents in the morning.  We arrived at the store before eight and was greeted by a very helpful man who addressed our problem straight away.  He was able to credit the original contract and generate a new one for the actual unit we have at home. At this point, it was discovered that they did not have sanding sheets in the quantity we had purchased originally. I asked for a manager to review our situation. "Chuck" arrived within minutes and offered this creative,  beyond expected resolution: keep the model we have until we return the replacement unit.  The sanding sheets we purchased yesterday will work with Unit2. To Summarize: we all make mistakes..the way we resolve those mistakes tells the world how much "customer service " matters to us individually and the company we represent.   Blue Rents of Mobile scored off the charts... Thanks to everyone who assisted in this encounter...... S Johnson

name: Andie Jordan
text: My family always rents equipment and event rentals from Blue Rents. They have a variety of equipment rentals that I am able to rent at the last minute to do my weekend yard work.  Thank goodness they are open on Saturdays.  I have even been able to rent a inflatable at the last minute on a Saturday and throw a wonderful tailgate party.  Sundays are always a free rental day which gives me a longer time to use what I rent.  Thanks for being open on the weekends, and having a variety of party rentals and lawn care equipment to help me and my family!

text: Friendly and efficient at the front desk. The guys in the back took the time to explain the operation of the equipment. The equipment performed very well. Rental and return was smooth. Easy access from the I-10 service road. Recommend.

text: I arrived at Blue rent 4:45pm.I was out of blue rent at 5:00pm   that was some awesome service and I was in the heavy equipment side. Thanks guys for your awesome service.

text: I rented a golf cart and while trying to load it on a trailer it wouldn’t start so we all assumed that it was the battery the dead and instead of the manager buying a new battery he suggested that we waited for it to charge for a little while and suggested that we have jumper cables just in case the golf cart battery dies again we refused and asked the manager again would he purchase a battery since the battery source is right next door and he still refused I got my money back because of the hassle and non customer care that I received the manager acted as if he didn’t want me to rent the golf cart from the beginning with his racist attitude that he presented us with he was very unfriendly and nonchalant about the situation from the start he was very unpleasant when the lady inside forgot to charge me for the damage deposit he came out and asked if I was the one that rented the golf cart I said yes and he unpleasantly stated that I needed to go back inside and pay it as if it was my fault that I didn’t pay and I will not ever rent anything else from a place that exhibits prejudice because my money is green too I give two thumbs down 👎🏽 For blue rents .

name: Jessica Whigham
text: I didn't like the fact that the representative placed me on hold and then the line disconnected (hung up in my face). AWFUL customer service. She could have simply said we're closing please call back Monday or she could have taken my number and called me back Monday. I'm planning an event. I will definitely spend my money somewhere else with good customer service. They ruined a business opportunity before it even began.

name: Kerry Lambert
text: We had a Easter Egg Hunt at our facility.  And rented a big slide from Blue Rents. The kids loved it and so did the parents!

name: Mandi Donald
text: DO NOT USE!!!!!!!!!!!! I hired Blue Rents to provide tables, chairs and tents for my company (a major corporation) for a community event sponsoring a local high school. There were over 300 public officials including law enforcement, firemen, EMTs from the area. Also, the school board and all faculty from the school system. My initial experience with a salesperson, Margaret, was pleasant. I explained my needs and she booked every item as needed. The day before the event- I received a confirmation call for delivery the following day between 12 and 2. This reassured me that everything would go as scheduled. This was not the case. I called 6 times trying to get the salesperson to give me an ETA. This proved to be around 4pm. The event started at 5pm. They sent one guy with part of my order. Because there was only 1 guy- my children unloaded and set up the tables with the table cloths- 18 to be exact! This guy only had the railing for the 2 tents. About 30 minutes later- another guy showed up with a helper. They had to find a faucet to load the water barrels to hold the tents down....After all of this... they had NONE of my CHAIRS! After a call to the salesperson- she had the audacity to say- "You didn't order chairs"!!!!!!!!! Thank goodness one of the catering people knew the Vice Principal of this school. Between my children, the lady and my husband- we took our own vehicle to pick up over 100 chairs and set them up ourselves. I cannot stress enough that you do not need to put any faith in this company. They do not stand behind anything they promise. I do not know how they stay in business. I cannot disclose our company name (a major petro-chem company). Just know that you've been warned.

name: Rolounda Hayes
text: Rented a fryer from Blue Rent for a family reunion this past weekend. We were ultimately never able to use the equipment. We purchased about 100 lbs of fish and shrimp for this event and it all went to waste. I asked for a partial refund which was $65. The person who I spoke with told me I would be refunded. Afterwards they stated nothing was wrong with the equipment, and they wouldn't be issuing a refund. I stated we couldn't get it to work properly. We took a much bigger lose then they did. This company is very inconsiderate and I don't recommend anyone to use them.

name: Samantha Moats
text:
I have not used this company personally for rentals. However, I work at a venue that is used for weddings. On every occasion, their male staff that helps with set up makes our female staff uncomfortable with remarks they make to each of us.

Management, please get this behavior under control. We don't show up to your place of employment and hit on your staff; your staff absolutely should not do it to ours.

name: Wendi Ham
text: I had a really poor experience with customer service here. We rented a restroom trailer for our wedding. Despite multiple contacts with sales, we were not informed that we needed a water hookup until the day of delivery. When I called to confirm that there was not a onboard water tank, they refused to let me talk with the manager and talked over me until I admittedly lost my cool and was hung up on with no return call from the manager. On the day of the wedding, a neighbor who was kind enough to make sure everything was running smoothly found that the generator had stopped working and was hung up on by the receptionist after trying to contact the person who told him they would fix the problem. We ended up fixing it ourselves. The rudeness of the staff was appalling, especially considering the amount we paid to their company. We will never use this company again and will recommend others to avoid this company at all costs.

name: Stacy Wiggins
text:
I am so disappointed with our experience with Pre Events. I spent an incredible amount of time planning each of the tiniest details for our wedding and sacrificed a lot of extras to make it happen financially.

When I arrived to the venue the day of the wedding, I realized that Pre Events had delivered the wrong tables. I spent the first thirty minutes of my time there crying because I had spent so much time planning every detail and these tables looked absolutely nothing like the ones I had ordered. Unfortunately despite the efforts of my MOH and wedding planner, there was no time to have the tables swapped out. It was a hard pill to swallow but I married the man of my dreams that day and tried to let it go with promises that the company would do something to make it up to us.

I have never been talked to the way I was talked to by the VP of this company, Mike. He said the mix up was our fault. BRIDES BEWARE. When you go to their landing page for tables, there are no names. You will only find the item name and detail if you click on each individual photo. Mike said the miscommunication happened when I chose the “farm table” available in the Auburn location but their sales rep in Birmingham thought I wanted the “farm table” in the Birmingham location. With Auburn being only a drive away, and also not even knowing about the other “farm table” I just assumed that the delivery fees included getting me the tables from Auburn.

Not once did their sales rep mention that they had two tables by the same name. Not once did she try to clarify. And to have my wedding day tarnished, TO BE TOLD THAT IT WAS MY FAULT, was completely disappointing to say the least.

We spent around $6000 total with this company. And if I could do it all again I would’ve given every cent to a company that cares about its customers.

Trying to let go of the fact that a big business wins again and this will never be made right.

name: Shea Poole
text: I paid $300 to rent a bouncy house for my sons 5th birthday party, this was going to be his very first real birthday party with friends from school invited, but it rained the day before and completely flooded the entire park where we were supposed to have our party so needless to say we could no longer have the party much less use a bouncy house that requires electricity when the ground is under 5in of water where a bunch of 4yr olds would be playing!!! I spent the next several hours trying to get in touch with the company to let them know and to ask about a rain check(which EVERY OTHER COMPANY GIVES) and I am told no but that I could get a 25% discount on another rental and that was only after being at a complete loss for words!! I paid $300 to pick up a bouncy house that never left the back of my truck because the entire Leeds area was flooded the day before!! I will NEVER rent from this sorry place again! And I was given the excuse of someone had to be there for me to pick up my rental so they couldn’t give me money back or a rain check!! It cost $300 to have some there! They had no fork lift to help load this VERY heavy thing into my truck so if my dad had not been there to help I wouldn’t have even been able to take it home when I got there!!! So now I’m out $300 and will have to spend another $300 or $400 to rent from another company for when we reschedule my sons party since this place expected me to use it in standing water! NEVER again will I rent from this company

Update: we just used them for the second year running for birthday parties and everything was just as awesome this summer. The pick-up/drop-off process was easy. They are all super friendly. The inflatables were in good conditions and very easy to set up (less easy to expertly fold back up into the minivan, but we knew what we were getting into ;) ). My kids love having them for the whole weekend and the price was perfect and as advertised with no hidden fees at checkout. I absolutely recommend them!
-------
We were beyond satisfied with their service. We rented a bounce house for our kids' birthdays over a weekend to make up for their big party being cancelled. The kids were thrilled!!! Their service was excellent. Their staff is very friendly and helpful. The inflatable was clean and high quality. While shopping around for rentals, we found a lot of companies to have hidden fees that show up at checkout (set up and delivery, mostly) which doubled the cost in many cases. Here you will need two able bodied adults on your end to set up and break down for transportation back, but that is clear from their website and you save a lot of money. We will definitely be using them in the future for any future parties!

name: Lyn Fields
text: Rented a "mister" fan for our sons birthday, and luckily we tried it out before using with our guests. Bc only 2 the nozzles worked properly and had valves.  The water was spraying directly into the fan motor.  So my husband did his best to fix it with no luck.  The fan itself was very beat up and barely a difference between low and high.  Upon returning the fan a manager told my husband only $10 of our $60 could be refunded.  Also admitted there were new mister kitsch the back but the guys didn't want to install them...

resp.text: Mrs. Fields, I apologize for the problems that you experienced. I have investigated this incident and I discovered that it was a new 'Mister Kit' that was on your fan, but unfortunately it was malfunctioning. Upon return of the fan we offered your husband a refund, but he said to charge him for the fan, "Because the fan worked and we used it." Well, the 42 inch Fan rents for $50 and the Mister Kit addition is only $10 - hence the $10 refund. Again, I apologize to you for the malfunctioning Mister Kit.  I would love the opportunity to make it up to you by offering you a full $60 credit toward any future rental item. Mistakes happen, but we want to make it right with you!
